title: UNITED ARAB EMIRATES: Dubai's Burj Khalifa
text: Be awed with the Burj Khalifa during our Dubai holidays. Also known as Burj Dubai, the mixed-used skyscraper remains the world's tallest building.

text: Discover the Eiffel in our holiday tour packages, and identify with the iconic symbol of Paris skyline, culture, economy and industrial strength.

title: CANADA: Niagara Falls.
text: Visit the Niagara Falls, a geological wonder  and one of the most famous waterfalls in the world, embedded in our holiday packages

title: NIGERIA: Lekki Conservative Center
text: LCC represents the preservation of unique biodiversity, scenic, natural, scientific recreational values of the coastal environs of western Nigeria.
